website_summaries.verdict: Professional skateboarder Mikey Taylor’s signature skate shoe from DC took the skate shoe market by storm by fusing style and performance altogether for a kick that one can wear on and off the board. Though most wearers had to size up, this shoe impresses buyers for its comfort whether skating or not. The Super Suede upper delivers long-lasting durability that can withstand every wear and tear of skateboarding. Although some prefer a vulcanized sole, this shoe’s cupsole nevertheless provides excellent board feel and flexibility.
pros: Many purchasers agree that the DC Mikey Taylor S is a stylish skate shoe that can be worn on and off the board
This shoe features a cupsole but still has a great board feel and protection, according to a few reviewers
This DC shoe is a favorite skate shoe of many because it feels great to skate in and the Super Suede upper is durable
There were several comments from purchasers saying that this DC shoe exceeded their expectations
It is a lightweight and comfortable shoe to wear as an everyday pair, according to them
This Mikey Taylor signature shoe is affordable
Some reviewers were pleased that this shoe feels nice and soft with excellent support
cons: Several reviewers stated that the DC Mikey Taylor S fits small and narrow
This skate shoe takes a longer time to break in because of its cupsole, according to a few users
One video reviewer highlighted that the arch support of this shoe is minimal
A few commenters said that this shoe does not have much impact on the bottom
One reviewer complained that the shoelaces of this shoe are short

customer_reviews.title: Nice style. Fits too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look of these shoes, but they are too narrow. I have fairly narrow feet, and usually take a size 10. DCs pretty much universally fit small, so I got a 10.5. Initially, they were comfortable, but after wearing them around the house for a couple hours, I really noticed how narrow they were, and they started rubbing uncomfortably along the instep. I returned the shoes after that. Disappointing, because the style and color are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jammer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Very durable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Very durable shoe. The outside is suede. The shoes we received have white around the soles not brown like the picture. ;(
customer_reviews.author: andrew ohmer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice clean looking shoes. Just a little tight on the feet and I have average to narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Gorky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought ir for my son and he said they are really comftable
customer_reviews.author: meyli a hallal g

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe size is pretty accurate and fits me as expected. The shoes are somewhat comfortable. The soles are just starting to seperate after a little skateboarding. Nothing that can't be fixed
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Albano

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe at a good price when on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Beitz

customer_reviews.title: My Son loved the shoes
customer_reviews.text: My Son loved the shoes. I bought him 2 pair for his birthday! The Olive color and the Grey pair. He received a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good shoe
customer_reviews.text: fits fine, it's a cup sole but has tons of board feel. this is my second pair because I liked how my first pair skated. last about a month w shoe goo. or at least they did for me
customer_reviews.author: Wow

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: showed up on time, nothing to complain about, fit good, I cant see any reason I would give them less than 3 or 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: mikey

customer_reviews.title: Enjoi'd
customer_reviews.text: Really good shoe, held up surprisingly well. The suede dealt with all the skateboarding thrown at it, good first effort by M. Taylor and DC in a pro shoe for him. Liked the simple design and shoe lace length was perfect since most companies(vans) make them way to long.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sanderlin

product_meta.title: Dc - Mens Mikey Taylor S Cupsole Shoe, UK: 7 UK, Tan
